mapper.insert: INSERT INTO setmeal(CATEGORY_ID, NAME, PRICE, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER) values (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select:
# 分页查询 select setmeal.*,category.name as category_name from setmeal LEFT JOIN category ON setmeal.category_id = category.id
and setmeal.status like concat('%', #{status}, '%')
and setmeal.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and setmeal.category_id like concat('%', #{categoryId}, '%')
order by setmeal.create_time desc
